version_description: Welcome to our latest new location - Corn Dog Van! Grill delicious corn dogs, make yummy chocolate, strawberry and vanilla frosted donuts, serve lots of soda and be prepared to serve tons of customers.

Prepare yourself for new, spicy dishes, because it's our new location – Café Mexicana! Try out your skills at preparing nachos, mixing up guacamole, salsa, mincing meat for the best tacos and quesadillas! The customers can't wait to try out your new meals

Prepare yourself for new, spicy dishes, because it's our new location – Café Mexicana! Try out your skills at preparing nachos, mixing up guacamole, salsa, mincing meat for the best tacos and quesadillas! The customers can't wait to try out your new meals

Surprise your customers in our new location - the House of Crab! Prepare the gourmet King Crab, garnished with asparagus, lettuce and distinctive sauces. If the remarkable King Crab is not enough for you, try serving the Boston Cream Pie! Fun awaits under

Surprise your customers in our new location - the House of Crab! Prepare the gourmet King Crab, garnished with asparagus, lettuce and distinctive sauces. If the remarkable King Crab is not enough for you, try serving the Boston Cream Pie! Fun awaits under

We are excited to open our new restaurant - the official FC Barcelona Sports Bar! Cook tasty food and serve famous FC Barcelona players! Meet Lionel Messi, Neymar, Luis Suárez, Gerard Piqué and Andrés Iniesta as your customers! Cook traditional dishes and

The wait is over - please welcome our new restaurant Sunset Waffles! Serve your clients delicate waffles while enjoying the beautiful sunsets in the Paradise Island. You can add different flavors to your waffles, such as chocolate, strawberry or wildberry

Welcome to the new Alpine Resort location with a brand new restaurant, the Smokey Grill BBQ! This unique restaurant has been designed for the most skillful chefs! Grill meat and sausages, serve them with with ginger ale, and warm up your clients in the co

Celebrate Halloween with Cooking Fever! The customers are all dressed up in spook-tastic outfits and are having a fang-tastic Halloween!
Minor bug fixes

The all new and exciting Italian Buffet has come to Cooking Fever! Experience authentic Italian gastronomy - spaghetti, ravioli, panettone! No customer can resist the fragrance of fresh basil and olives.

Mediterranean vibes are coming to Paradise Island. Surprise your customers with gyros and freshly cooked mackerel! Sweeten their day with tasty desserts like bougatsa, kataifi, halfa and baklava! Dance your way into the new Greek Sirtaki Taverna!
